text: 11.32 Jna 3.5 Pen Jona ne amɨl, taun Ninipa binɨb okok bɨlel kɨlop agñek nɨŋɨd, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨlak agak. Jona bɨ yokɨp ak agek nɨg dɨlak ak pen, nɨbi mɨñɨl mɨdebɨm awl, bɨawl yɨbɨl takaw agup ak ma dɨpɨm agak. Anɨb ak God ne aglup ñɨn ak, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ag gɨnɨgab ak, taun Ninipa binɨb okok kɨli tɨkjakɨnɨgabal agak. Tɨkjakɨl, binbɨ mɨñɨl mɨdɨl tap si tap tɨmel gɨpɨm anɨb okok agyɨkɨnɨgabal agak.
